    • getById

      public static CompanyDTO getById(long id) throws CompanyNotFoundException
      Retrieves a Company by its ID and converts it to a DTO.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the Company to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A DTO representation of the Company.
      Throws:
      CompanyNotFoundException - If a company with the specified ID does not exist.

    • getCompaniesDTO

      public static List<CompanyDTO> getCompaniesDTO() throws NoCompaniesException
      Retrieves all companies and converts them to DTOs.
      Returns:
      A list of DTOs representing all Companies.
      Throws:
      NoCompaniesException - If no companies exist in the database.
